110  State(const uint numberRobots, const std::vector<bool>& robotsBeingUsed)
111  : nRobots(numberRobots), predicted(nRobots, false),
112  landmarkMeasurementsDone(nRobots, false),
113  targetMeasurementsDone(nRobots, false), robots(nRobots),
114  robotsUsed(robotsBeingUsed)
115  {
116  reset();
117  }

119  private:
120  void print(std::ostringstream& oss, std::vector<bool>& vec)
121  {
122  oss << "[";
123 
124  for (std::vector<bool>::iterator it = vec.begin(); it != vec.end(); ++it)
125  oss << *it;
126 
127  oss << "]";
128  return;
129  }
130 
131  public:
132  // TODO add state print
133  void print()
134  {
135  std::ostringstream oss;
136  oss << "PF State:";
137  oss << std::endl
138  << "-predicted = ";
139  print(oss, predicted);
140  oss << std::endl
141  << "-landmarkMeasurementsDone = ";
142  print(oss, landmarkMeasurementsDone);
143  oss << std::endl
144  << "-targetMeasurementsDone = ";
145  print(oss, targetMeasurementsDone);
146  oss << std::endl
147  << "-targetPredicted = " << targetPredicted;
148  oss << std::endl
149  << "-robotsFused = " << robotsFused;
150  oss << std::endl
151  << "-targetFused = " << targetFused;
152  oss << std::endl
153  << "-resampled = " << resampled;
154 
155  ROS_DEBUG("%s", oss.str().c_str());
156  }
157 
162  void reset()
163  {
164  predicted.assign(nRobots, false);
165  landmarkMeasurementsDone.assign(nRobots, false);
166  targetMeasurementsDone.assign(nRobots, false);
167  robotsFused = targetFused = resampled = targetPredicted = false;
168 
169  for (uint r = 0; r < nRobots; ++r)
170  {
171  if (!robotsUsed[r])
172  {
173  predicted[r] = true;
174  landmarkMeasurementsDone[r] = true;
175  targetMeasurementsDone[r] = true;
176  }
177  }
178  }
179 
186  bool allPredicted()
187  {
188  for (std::vector<bool>::iterator it = predicted.begin();
189  it != predicted.end(); ++it)
190  {
191  if (false == *it)
192  return false;
193  }
194 
195  return true;
196  }
197 
203  bool allLandmarkMeasurementsDone()
204  {
205  for (std::vector<bool>::iterator it = landmarkMeasurementsDone.begin();
206  it != landmarkMeasurementsDone.end(); ++it)
207  {
208  if (false == *it)
209  return false;
210  }
211 
212  return true;
213  }
214 
220  bool allTargetMeasurementsDone()
221  {
222  for (std::vector<bool>::iterator it = targetMeasurementsDone.begin();
223  it != targetMeasurementsDone.end(); ++it)
224  {
225  if (false == *it)
226  return false;
227  }
228 
229  return true;
230  }
231  };
